alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 9:25PM PST until January 15 at 2:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. Local gusts to 65 mph on the ridges and desert slopes of the San Diego County Mountains. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Through 2 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Hazardous travel for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another Pacific storm could bring strong winds again Sunday night through Tuesday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
